mapper.select:
select SYSTEM as system, TEMPERATURE as temperature, PRESSURE as pressure, datadate as dataFactDate, TO_CHAR(DATADATE,'mi')||':00' as periodDate,
TO_CHAR(DataDate,'mi') || ':' || case when To_number(TO_CHAR(DataDate,'ss'))<05 then '00' when To_number(TO_CHAR(DataDate,'ss'))<10 then '05' when To_number(TO_CHAR(DataDate,'ss'))<15 then '10' when To_number(TO_CHAR(DataDate,'ss'))<20 then '15' when To_number(TO_CHAR(DataDate,'ss'))<25 then '20' when To_number(TO_CHAR(DataDate,'ss'))<30 then '25' when To_number(TO_CHAR(DataDate,'ss'))<35 then '30' when To_number(TO_CHAR(DataDate,'ss'))<40 then '35' when To_number(TO_CHAR(DataDate,'ss'))<45 then '40' when To_number(TO_CHAR(DataDate,'ss'))<50 then '45' when To_number(TO_CHAR(DataDate,'ss'))<55 then '50' else '55' end as secondDate from PCWHUMITUREDATA WHERE TEMPERATURE is not NULL and PRESSURE is not NULL and TEMPERATURE != -2147483648 and PRESSURE != -2147483648 and DATADATE >= #{beginDate} and DATADATE <= #{endDate} AND SYSTEM=#{system,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by dataFactDate

select a.SYSTEM, a.TEMPERATURE, a.PRESSURE from PCWHUMITUREDATA a inner join ( select max(DATADATE) as DATADATE, SYSTEM as system from PCWHUMITUREDATA where TEMPERATURE is not NULL and PRESSURE is not NULL and TEMPERATURE != -2147483648 and PRESSURE != -2147483648 group by SYSTEM ) b on a.DATADATE = b.DATADATE and a.SYSTEM = b.SYSTEM where TEMPERATURE is not NULL and PRESSURE is not NULL and TEMPERATURE != -2147483648 and PRESSURE != -2147483648 and a.SYSTEM IN
#{system}
